Feb. 8, 2020 D Unibrass Shield
Unibrass Shield 1 Entertainments Contest UniBrass: The University Brass Band Championships of Great Britain and Northern Ireland unibrass-shield
Bangor University (Pritchard Jones Hall), Bangor, Gwynedd, Wales, UK Best Soloist: Dominic Gardner (Trombone) Most Entertaining Band: Sheffield Best March: Sheffield Best Percussion Section: Bangor Best Student Conductor: Jack Aitken (Sheffield)
Best Student Composition: Thomas Whitcombe
Jan. 29, 2020, 11 a.m. Feb. 8, 2020, 9:52 p.m.
1 University of Sheffield Brass Band Jack Aitken
2 Bristol University Matt Roche
